metadata.dc:author: Matusevich, Daniel
metadata.dc:description: The aim of this paper is to describe aspects of the relation between sexuality and narcissism in the elderly starting from some fragments of The dying animal, written by the american novelist Philip Roth.
metadata.dc:title: Sexualidad, narcisismo y genitalidad en la obra de Philip Roth.
[Sexuality and Narcisism in the work of Philip Roth].
